meanings.definition: The act of traveling by sea.
meanings.sent1: Many dream of adventurous seafarings to distant lands.
meanings.sent2: Seafarings have been a vital part of human history for centuries.
meanings.sent3: The seafarings of the pirates led to buried treasures and tall tales.
meanings.sent4: Her seafarings through life's storms taught her resilience and strength.
meanings.sent5: The seafarings of the ancient explorers opened up new worlds of possibilities.

meanings.definition: The profession or practice of navigating or working on a ship.
meanings.sent1: His family has been involved in seafarings for generations.
meanings.sent2: Seafarings require both skill and courage to face the open ocean.
meanings.sent3: The seafarings of the crew were filled with camaraderie and hard work.
meanings.sent4: In the world of seafarings, every sailor has a story to tell.
meanings.sent5: The seafarings of the fishermen brought in a bountiful catch.
